name: VNDetectHumanRectanglesRequest
desc: A request that finds rectangular regions that contain people in an image.

items.name: var upperBodyOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request requires detecting a full body or upper body only to produce a result.

items.name: var results: [VNHumanObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the request to find rectangular regions that contain people in an image.
